p: The methanol extracts of L. inermis, A. aspera and A. indica leaves tested positive for alkaloids, terpenoids, phenolic compounds, tannins and steroids tests. Furthermore, L. inermis contained anthraquinones, whereas A. indica contained saponins and flavonoids. However, L. inermis did not contain flavonoids or saponins, and flavonoids were absent from A. aspera. A. indica was negative for the anthraquinones test (TableÂ 2).
